sqlMap.select: select DISTINCT(t1.id) from ( select * from t_center_finance where logTime >= #beginTime# and logTime <= #endTime# ) t1, ( select * from t_center_finance where logTime >= #beginTime# and logTime <= #endTime# ) t2 where t1.monthIndex = t2.monthIndex and t1.id > t2.id order by t1.id desc
